content.content: Hey guys! I’m part of a team of builders and we finally want to seriously get involved in blockchains besides just speculating on different coins. Currently, I’m looking around different communities to see what kind of useful thing we could build. I would be happy about any input

First of all, it would provide a solution or a product aimed at a particular sector. Excuse my bad English a bit, but when you mean builder do you mean app or dapps creator, or just the ones from Obra and architects?

Hey @builderman - awesome to see that you are interested in contributing to the project! In SES we are working on creating a list of projects based on risks and opportunities in MakerDAO that could act as inspiration of things you could work on, i.e. for a grant, or as a Core Unit. We’re hoping to have this list ready soon, but in the mean time there are some good suggestions in the above thread that might be interesting to you. I’m curiously following this thread for ideas as well

We are not fixed or limited to build anything specific. We are just a group of guys/girls who are eager to get into the development of blockchain applications, etc. So we are welcoming every input you can think of
Thank you so much for sharing this with us! I would love to be updated on when the list is extended!
